/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban jungle. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the distance, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a soft, golden light.
